page.title: 16Prestwood Computer/TV/Bikes
page.content: {Computer at home No home computer} Girls: 42 * 50 Boys : 60 * 28 _______________________________________ {Average hrs. of TV watched each week:} Age (Yrs& All Girls Boys Months) 8-8.11 15.75 14.6 17.00 9-9.11 16.00 15.5 17.5 10-10.11 20.3 17.00 23.3 11+ 22.6 22.0 25.4 The range was 45 - from between 0 hours a week for a few children, to 40+ hrs for a few children. We found our graph was a fairly smooth, even, bell-shape. 46 children watch < 10 hrs TV/week 81 children watch 10 - 20 hrs TV/week 34 children watch 21 - 30 hrs TV/week 19 children watch 30+ hrs TV/week. _______________________________________ {Out of 180 children who replied, 173 own a bicycle. }
